s: 1 day ago - The name is a play on Mountain Dew: "sierra" is the Spanish word for "mountain range" and both mist and dew are composed of water droplets. The drink was rebranded as "Mist Twst" in 2016, but reverted to Sierra Mist in 2018. In early 2023, Sierra Mist was replaced by Starry. The brand was aimed ...

s: Sierra Mist is taking on a new name and a new look.

t: Sierra Mist to become 'Mist Twst' in major brand overhaul | Food Dive
s: December 18, 2015 - Sierra Mist is preparing for a major brand overhaul as it drops the "Sierra" to become "Mist Twst" and PepsiCo zeroes in on the soda's flavor messaging, particularly the "lemon-lime credentials of the product," a PepsiCo spokeswoman told Ad Age.

t: Sierra Mist TWST 20oz Bottle – House of Ambrose
Mist Twst | The Soda Wiki | Fandom
s: January 18, 2025 - Mist Twst was a brand of lemon-lime soda that was originally released by PepsiCo in 2016. Mist Twst was released by PepsiCo in 2016 to replace their Sierra Mist brand, with the high-fructose corn syrup formerly on Sierra Mist being brought back for the rebrand.

t: What happened to sierra mist soda? - Chef's Resource
s: April 15, 2024 - PepsiCo decided to rebrand Sierra Mist to Mist Twst as part of an effort to modernize the product and attract a younger consumer base. The company wanted to breathe new life into the brand and capture a larger market share.
